dataIdInfo.idAbs: Input four or more `final` maps generated using the Thorium model tool, compute the Chi-Squared statistic for each map using a thorium abundance layer as the reference, and render (1) a difference map for each input and (2) a 1d cubic interpolation between the individual data points.

tool.name: ChiSqDifference

param.name: workspace
param.dialogReference: The workspace (GDB) into which the difference maps will be saved.

param.name: thorium_raster
param.dialogReference: The base abundance layer at 0.5 degrees per pixel.

param.name: uncertraster
param.dialogReference: The uncertainty assessment for the abundance layer. Also at 0.5 degrees per pixel.

param.name: in_features
param.dialogReference:
A table containing two columns: (1) Input Raster and (2) Name

Input Raster: The 'final' map raster generated using the Thorium Model tool.

Name: An arbitrary name provided by the user that identifies the difference map and data points on the graph.

The order the maps are entered into this table corresponds to the ordering of the x-axis of the graph.

tool.summary: Input four or more `final` maps generated using the Thorium model tool, compute the Chi-Squared statistic for each map using a thorium abundance layer as the reference, and render (1) a difference map for each input and (2) a 1d cubic interpolation between the individual data points.
